model_answer:
The correct answers are B and C.
During segment 5 of the video, the screen shows both the Firewall pages and the Wi-Fi settings (with 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz radios). To align with these on-screen sections, you would need to disable both the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Wi-Fi networks from the LAN WiFi sub-tab as instructed in option B. It is also advisable to back up your router configuration before making any changes so you can revert later, as instructed in option C.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on networking for help. When a user logs into an administrative interface, they should see the system status dashboard which includes internet connection details.

Therefore, the answer is (D).
